title: Homicide charge filed in death of 6-year-old girl in Pittsburgh
content:
PITTSBURGH —
The man accused of shooting a 6-year-old girl in the head has now been charged with criminal homicide several days after the girl’s death.
Kamau Thomas Jr., 19, was initially charged with attempted homicide and other offenses after the shooting of Isis Allen earlier this month. The girl was shot while she was walking past a home in Pittsburgh’s Knoxville neighborhood. She died several days later.
The criminal homicide charge was filed against Thomas on Tuesday.
He is being held in the Allegheny County Jail after being denied bail.
